entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQR.IFRS.0102.9543] Laaja tulos with a value of 1,040,000 is not equal to the combined total of Voitto (tai tappio) and Muut laajan tuloksen erät ( 93,996,000 + 1,040,000 ) with a value of 95,036,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncome fact are: Period :2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Laaja tulos : -3 Decimals of Voitto (tai tappio) : -3 Decimals of Muut laajan tuloksen erät : -3
Rule Element Id:9543 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/7437006ZZI1F7CUA5518/2021-12-31/ESEF/FI/0/fingrid-2021-12-31.zip/fingrid-2021-12-31/reports/fingrid-2021-12-31.html 15128

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement [320000] Statement of comprehensive income, profit or loss, by nature of expense includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:ProfitLossBeforeTax of 187,631,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 210,849,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -3. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:ProfitLossBeforeTax that should add to 187,631,000 are comprised of the following:
+ ProfitLossFromOperatingActivities 210,801,000 + ShareOfProfitLossOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod 48,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for [320000] Statement of comprehensive income, profit or loss, by nature of expense. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:ProfitLossBeforeTax Total Value : 187,631,000 Total period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -3 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/7437006ZZI1F7CUA5518/2021-12-31/ESEF/FI/0/fingrid-2021-12-31.zip/fingrid-2021-12-31/reports/fingrid-2021-12-31.html 15079

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement [520000] Statement of cash flows, indirect method includes an inconsistent calculation. The sum of these child components is 273,519,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -3. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities that should add to 461,150,000 are comprised of the following:
+ CongestionIncome 283,776,000 + AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInInventories -549,000 + AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInTradeAccountReceivable -25,950,000 + AdjustmentsForDepreciationAndAmortisationExpense 99,884,000 + AdjustmentsForFairValueGainsLosses -45,000 + AdjustmentsForFinanceCosts 23,217,000 + AdjustmentsForImpairmentLossReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLoss -62,201,000 + AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingPayables 232,000 + AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInTradeAccountPayable -6,806,000 + AdjustmentsForLossesGainsOnDisposalOfNoncurrentAssets 69,000 + AdjustmentsForProvisions -44,000 - AdjustmentsForUndistributedProfitsOfAssociates 48,000 - IncomeTaxesPaidRefundClassifiedAsOperatingActivities 35,210,000 - InterestPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities 18,827,000 + InterestReceivedClassifiedAsOperatingActivities 6,806,000 + OtherAdjustmentsForNoncashItems 9,215,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for [520000] Statement of cash flows, indirect method. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
